Description:
Perfectly Positioned in Seagrove.
Perfectly positioned with the walking track to the Cowes beach at the rear, this beautiful home is set in manicured gardens. If quality and a spacious floor plan is high on your list, then this is a must to inspect. The entry hall features American Oak boards and leads you into a formal lounge and then the huge open plan family living areas. The house has perfect orientation to the north with large decked areas and a sheltered alfresco area to the west. The living areas flow seamlessly from the inside to out and the gardens are always a restful feature.
The galley style kitchen features stainless steel appliances with a large under bench oven and gas hob and caesarstone benchtops, an abundance of cupboards and drawers for storage and a double door pantry. The dining area is large enough to comfortably seat 10 and the family living with combustion heating and a split system, opens to the alfresco - perfect spaces for entertaining.
The master suite is at the front of the home and has a large walk in robe and en suite with double basins with tasteful tiling and caesarstone benchtops.
Three double bedrooms all with built in robes share a family bathroom with separate toilet. Storage solutions are solved with linen cupboards and a well fitted laundry room.
The property is a joy to live in and is self sustainable with double glazing and a northerly orientation, one seldom needs to use heating or cooling and there is a 5.6 kw solar system on the roof and gas piped to the house from the Seagrove gas storage.
We invite you to inspect this beautiful home.
Insights: 34 Wagtail Way, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
TITLED BLOCK IN PRESTIGIOUS SEAGROVE ESTATE
Located in the prestigious Seagrove estate and surrounded by quality built homes, this South facing 588 Square metre block (Approx.) has plenty of room for you to build the house you have always dreamed of.
Enjoy the first class amenities this estate provides including 3 parks, playground, walking tracks and scenic lake, as well as piped LPG gas to the block, the only estate on Phillip Island to provide this service. The side boundaries are already fenced and all services including NBN and LPG gas are available to the block.
Located only 700 metres to Cowes boat ramp and North facing beaches and walking distance to the Cowes shopping centre and schools. With plenty of quality building companies to choose from, we will be able to help you put together a house and land package that will suit your needs and budget. Call today.
Insights: 9 Curlew Way, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Designed for a lifetime of enjoyment!
This stunning single level, family home, located in the heart of Cowes is an entertainers dream and sure to excite a wide variety of buyers.
Boasting four generous sized robed bedrooms, huge open plan living/kitchen/dining area, study, utility/ storage room, two modern bathrooms, one of which has a spa, European laundry, three toilets and an expansive, undercover entertaining deck at the rear, which flows off the main living area and is fully equipped with its own powder room.
The beautifully designed modern and spacious kitchen is complimented by stainless steel gas cooktop, electric oven and dishwasher, large bench tops, ample storage, north facing windows overlooking the picturesque rear garden - creating a sense of openness and inviting light through the home.
Other features include; modern look floating floors, split system heating and cooling, electric wall heaters to the bedrooms, ornate cornices, LED lighting, triple inline carport which accommodates for cars/boats/caravans/trailers and a lockable garden shed.
All set within a 672 sqm approx fenced allotment with established low maintenance surrounds, just a short stroll from the pristine Cowes beach and all Cowes has to offer.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

STAGE 9 SHEARWATER – TITLED LAND

These allotments offer all available services connected such as NBN, underground power, sewage, mains water & recycled water.
Shearwater offers walk ways and boardwalks throughout the estate with playgrounds and parks. The Shearwater lake offers a relaxing environment full of birdlife and all of this only 700m from the Cowes beach.
Call now for more details as these allotments won't be around for long 5952 2633

Description:
The Talk Of The Town!
This superbly located peaceful lifestyle apartment, just over a 100 metre stroll to the beach and directly adjacent to the shops, is set on the top level of a three storey modest complex perfectly located for you to enjoy the most relaxed and low maintenance lifestyle on your carefree weekends away from the busy city life. The apartment, with beautiful up close and amazing water views, comprises an open plan kitchen/living/dining area, two bedrooms with built in robes, a bathroom combined laundry, separate toilet and off street parking.
Additional features, split system heating/cooling - walk to everything from here; the ultimate in relaxed easy care living and enjoy everything that Cowes has to offer: beach, restaurants, cafes and shops. Inspection is a must!
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Under Contract!
A sense of Space!
Centrally located, right in the heart of Cowes with everything at your door step is this beautifully presented modern double storey weatherboard residence.
The bottom level comprises of an open plan living, kitchen and dining area, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, north facing entertaining deck, powder room and laundry.
Upstairs contains a second living space, main bathroom, three robed bedrooms; one of which has a walk in robe and ensuite.
Offering a host of additional features including polished timber floors, split system heating/cooling throughout, roman blinds, stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances that compliment the modern kitchen, high square set ceilings, outside shower and a double garage.
All of this is set within a 230sqm approx low maintenance allotment with lovely established surrounds, the property is just a short stroll to Doctors, supermarkets, restaurants, shops, RSL and Cowes Beach.
Suited to a wide variety of buyers this property is ready to go.
Inspections are by appointment only.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
LOOKING FOR THE PERFECT LOCATION?
This well positioned property is in a quiet and peaceful location yet is only a short stroll from all that Cowes has to offer. Boasting an open plan kitchen, dining and living space that enjoys direct access to the private courtyard to enjoy an afternoon cuppa. Two spacious bedrooms are serviced by a central bathroom and separate toilet. Quality fittings, split system heating and cooling plus lock up garage complete the picture and make this well worth your private inspection.
Additional features include spacious study/3rd bedroom, north facing low maintenance courtyard, naturally light & bright, garage access to the courtyard and minutes walking distance to the main street.
With endless options, a perfect first home, investment or holiday getaway and representing great value for money this is your opportunity to purchase into the thriving Phillip Island market.
Why wait, inspect now!

This immaculate home will be a dream come true for you. Offering open plan living with two generous living areas opening to an alfresco area and outside entertaining area. This four bedroom home, large master bedroom with ensuite plus three generous bedrooms all with BIR's.
The ultra modern kitchen, with pantry, will be a great plus for those budding foodies and those loving to entertain family and friends.
Only 6 minutes walk down to the Bella Vista Track and to Cowes West Bay beach.

You will have lots of time free to live the life of your dreams with this well and easy to maintain property. Excellent value - Ring Mike for an inspection.

Description:
CUSTOM MADE HOME
Situated in Seagrove Estate with only one neighboring house this custom designed and built family home is a rare gem with 4 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, 1 Shower/Bathtub.
You are welcomed by a bright high ceiling (square set), open plan living area and kitchen featuring a Caesar stone bench top long enough to be your breakfast bar, 90cm free standing oven, soft closing cupboards with plenty of storage and huge walk in pantry.
As you walk out to the backyard you are welcomed with a fully equipped outdoor kitchen with oven and room for a fridge followed with 2 garden sheds with heaps of storage.
Generous master bedroom with walk in robe, parents retreat and double vanity. Spacious bedrooms all with built in robes.
Massive cinema room that could be converted to an extra bedroom or lounge room.
Double garage including remote controlled double insulated door.
Landscaped with very low maintenance garden.
Inspection only by appointment, this won't last long on the market. Call Alex Scott and Staff on 5952 2633 to arrange an inspection.

Description:
BEAUTIFULLY PRESENTED FAMILY HOME
This immaculately presented family home is located in a quiet court position with great beach access and close to central Cowes.
The home offers spacious living with four bedrooms, the master with ensuite, kitchen with plenty of storage, large lounge and separate dining room complemented with ceiling fans throughout.
Additionally, there is a north facing covered entertainment area extending from the living area. Complete with cafe blinds it provides space to relax or entertain all year round.
The huge garage with remote roller door provides ideal storage for boats/caravans or would be ideal for a trades person.
Extra features include, big water tank with pump, 4.8kw solar system and established gardens.
Do not miss this opportunity to make this excellent property your home.

Description:
Australia Day Open Home Cancelled - Property Under Offer
Here lies a sensational opportunity for those looking for a near new family home where all of the hard work has been done. Don't worry about enduring a lengthy, frustrating building process, stylish contemporary living space perfect for first home buyers, growing and extended families, retirees and investors.
This quality designed and well-built home sits proudly on a generous block measuring over 664m2 approx. With gated side access this is ideally suited to those requiring additional secure parking space for work and recreational vehicles.
Step inside and be greeted by a functional, free-flowing floor plan with great use of natural light and a neutral colour scheme create a feeling of space. There are 3 generous robed bedrooms, the master offering a full ensuite and a walk in robe.
Those who love to entertain are bound to love the central hostess kitchen. Featuring quality stainless steel appliances, including a 900mm rangehood and oven with 5-burner cooktop, plus a bonus butler's pantry with dishwasher and extra storage space. Positioned adjacent to the spacious meals zone there is a casual flow to the expansive family room with feature raked ceiling and direct access to the outdoor entertaining area.
Step outside and enjoy your own private haven where the kids and pets will have plenty of room to play. If that is not enough space then it is only a short 150m approx walk to the fantastic Whyte Sands Park, Basketball, Football, Soccer and a Zip Line will keep them entertained.
Call today before it's SELLING, SELLING ..... SOLD!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Phillip Island.

Description:
Your Perfect Island Getaway!
Located within the popular and family friendly Ramada Resort on Phillip Island is this fabulous Villa presenting a wonderful opportunity to secure your weekend getaway at an affordable price! Comprising two bedrooms both with built in robes, an open plan living, kitchen and dining area, a bathroom with shower and vanity, a separate toilet and a European laundry; the Villa is offered fully furnished with extra features such as split system heating/cooling, gas heating, dishwasher, washing machine, dryer and ceiling fans. Creating a carefree retreat, the property has a spacious sunny north facing deck overlooking the natural landscaped surrounds plus a second smaller deck as well as parking for two cars.
The resort boasts outstanding facilities both for members and guests including a total of four indoor and outdoor swimming pools, "Numbers cafe and bar", pizzeria, gymnasium, tennis courts, spa, kids club & BBQ facilities.
This particular Villa is well located on Woodland Circuit and just a short walk to The Club and all of it's excellent facilities. A few minutes drive takes you into the Cowes shopping precinct, RSL and amazing north facing bay beach.
This Villa is a Leasehold property, currently in the Management Investment Scheme (MIS) which is managed by the Ramada
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island

Description:
CENTRAL LOCATION WALK TO EVERYTHING
Located in Central Cowes only a short stroll to the main street and approx. 180 metres to the sandy shores of Cowes north facing beach - this tightly held pocket of Cowes is well sought after and a brilliant location for either holiday or permanent residence.
The property features three good sized bedrooms, master with ensuite and three large living areas.
The open plan kitchen dining area is on the ground level and looks out onto the landscaped gardens. Being a north facing block, the property is filled with natural light. There is a full double garage and a north facing paved pergola area, perfect for the family BBQ. There is an outdoor shower and WC to rinse yourself off after being at the beach.
The property is situated on a 1,015m2 (approx.) parcel of land with the potential to subdivide off the rear of the property (STCA).
The local football and netball clubs are just around the corner, as is the local YMCA and skate park for the kids.
Leave your car at home and simply walk everywhere!

Description:
Shops, Sand and Sanctuary – Showstopper!
In a neighbourhood that offers unquestionable quality and presenting spaces that are truly unexpected, this family-sized townhouse is one that should not be missed. Making the most of proximity to cafes, local shops, medical centre this precinct is also close to bus routes, schools and recreation, as well as being walking distance to the Cowes foreshore. Only 500m to the water!
Through the gates is a generous drive with off street parking for 2 or more vehicles, maybe a boat? The North facing facade is impressive! Ground floor entrance, light filled space, 2 living zones and home to a master bedroom with the first of two bathrooms. The kitchen is compact, complete with all appliances that the modern chef requires before serving up in the adjacent meals area.
Outside, an alfresco deck offers yet more space for relaxed hosting, whilst the secure lawned area, fully fenced will appeal to children and those with pets.
An upstairs retreat delivers another zone in which to unwind - with the addition of two bedrooms with ( bir's), the 2nd bathroom and a north facing balcony completes the level.
Asking for no compromise, lock up garage, split system cooling and heating, alarm and garden shed finalise an exceptional easy-care offering. No matter what age or stage you are at this property and floorplan is the one in high demand coupled with the location second to none.
With close proximity to amenities, inspection a must!
-Cowes Esplanade 900m
-Cowes Yacht Club 700m
-Shopping Precinct 700m
-Primary School 1.2km
-New Haven College 6.8km
-Fairy Penguins 11.6km
-GP Track 10km

Description:
Look No Further!
Here is your chance to secure the ultimate family residence with multiple living zones split over 3 levels, perfect for a growing family or keen entertainer. Located on a low maintenance landscaped 603sqm allotment in a tightly held area of Cowes.
Creating a tranquil setting maximized by the entertaining zones. There is no doubt your family will be happy here embracing a first class family lifestyle in this idyllic setting. Enjoy the warmth and character this home has to offer whilst enjoying what the Island has to offer.
Downstairs offers a spacious lounge or rumpus room, 2 bedrooms, full sized laundry and main family bathroom. Plus access to the rear outdoor entertaining area, rear yard with garden shed also with access to the double carport.
The middle floor and front entrance links the upstairs and downstairs together with formal lounge, bathed with natural light and high ceilings, ideal for entertaining whilst overlooking the rear yard and being able to watch the kids play. Whilst also creating another great alfresco seating area.
Upstairs houses the master bedroom with BIR & ensuite, the well-appointed kitchen with open plan dining area, spacious living zone which allows immediate access to elevated outdoor entertaining area.
Saltwater Creek Reserve and Red Rocks Beach are at your doorstep with a stunning display of wildlife and walking tracks, within easy walking distance.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Desirable Beachside Location
Perfectly situated on a quiet street in a highly desirable beachside location, and just a short 750m approx stroll to the pristine Cowes foreshore, luxury living awaits you with this near new four-bedroom family designed residence. The home offers 25+ squares of living space, on a low maintenance landscaped allotment whilst been only a stone through to the North Shore estate Park
The intuitive design created with the perfect family living and entertaining in mind, whilst the modern aesthetics leave nothing for the wanting.
Displaying clean architectural lines, raised ceilings and premium fittings, the two-storey layout boasts a glamorous open-concept design; with separate formal lounge, a spacious living and dining zone uniting with a rear upstairs north facing alfresco outdoor entertaining. And centre stage is a Master Chef Quality kitchen featuring 900mm S/S appliances, a breakfast island bar, stone bench tops, and the luxury of 2 pantries, a generous lockable butlers pantry and a 2 door central pantry completing the perfect cooking triangle. You will also find the master bedroom with full ensuite, his and hers built in robes, with additional powder room. Completing the perfect house for entertaining.
Entering the home you will be impressed when you find further three spacious bedrooms providing absolute comfort and space with the clever design. Through to the separate rumpus area perfect for the kids or additional family to stay. Large powder room and central family bathroom, clever designed laundry with more than enough storage. Designed to either be locked for holiday rental use with plenty left for holiday use or perfect for permanent living.
Privacy and security are ensured, as the entrance driveway has an automated garage, and the house has a central alarm system. Further, the double garage has a convenient internal access, plus a single roller door at the rear perfect for the boat, van or trailer.
To enhance the 6 star energy rating and reduce utility bills, all windows and oversized sliding doors are double glazed. Further two separate central refrigerated A/C and heating systems (one upstairs & one downstairs) afford perfect climate control, suited to your needs. Lastly, external water tank is included.
Ideally suited to permanent, holiday living or as an excellent addition to your investment property portfolio.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Immaculate Central Cowes Investment!
This immaculate light filled unit of brick construction with quality fittings throughout is located in an excellent position within walking distance to the north facing Cowes beach and main shopping strip in Thompson Avenue, offering an array of cafe's, restaurants, and boutique shops.
With low maintenance surrounds and good provision for parking, the unit itself offers a very spacious open plan living, dining and kitchen area with stone bench tops and gleaming tiled floor, three generous bedrooms including the master with ensuite.
Additional features include: 2 x split systems heating/cooling, dishwasher, stone bench tops throughout, sunny outdoor courtyard, 2000 litre water tank, exposed aggregate concrete driveways, and single remote garage, with internal access.
This quality built home is currently used as a holiday rental investment property, separately titled (with no body corporate) and offering solid annual returns. It would also appeal as a permanent home for those looking for a low maintenance property in a very convenient location.
This property for sale in Cowes, is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.
